title: Bar Numbering
content:
This indicator displays the bar sequence number at a certain interval.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Visualization

NameDescription
Font Specifies various settings for the font.
Font Color Sets the color of the label text.
Display at bottom Allows you to display a label at the bottom of the chart.
Vertical offset Sets the y-axis offset of the label in pixels.
Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.
Reset on new session When the function is enabled, previously memorized actions will be reset at the start of a new session.
